item.description:
In celebration of St. Patrick's Day
We will get together at an Irish Pub
In West Haven.

Duffys Tavern
241 Campbell Avenue
West Haven, Conn. 06516
(203) 933-9721

http://www.duffystave...

www.duffystavern.net/

There is a large parking lot across the street that you can
Try to park in, depending if there is any room.
Not advisable to try to park in the back of the restaurant.

You can have coffee, other hot drinks, other beverages and / or
An evening meal.

Coming from I 95 South there are a couple of exits to get off.

There is the very sharp turn Exit 44.
Go over the Kimberly Avenue Bridge.

Stay on Elm Street until you see Dunkin Donuts on your right and
Burger King in front of you.

Turn left on to Campbell Avenue.
When you see Walgreens on your right, then
Start looking a few blocks later for
Duffys on your left.

An alternate route coming from I 95 South if you do not
Want to take the sharp turn of exit 44.
Get off Exit 43. Turn Left.
When you see a Rite Aid Pharmacies, then
Turn right on Elm Street.
Follow Elm Street Directions from above.

Coming from I 95 North
Get Off on Exit 43
Turn right on Campbell Avenue
When you see Walgreens on your right, then
Start looking a few blocks later for
Duffys on your left.

Remember that most other
Celebrations for St Patrick's Day will between
March 9 to 17th at different locations

Some of the local St. Patricks Day Parade's and
Other Events are


A.
New Haven's Parade is on March 14

http://www.saintpatri...

www.saintpatricksdayparade.com/new_haven/new_haven.htm

http://www.stpatricks...

www.stpatricksdayparade.org/parade.html

B.
Milford Parade is on March 13

http://www.ihspipesan...

www.ihspipesanddrums.com/


C.

http://www.saintpatri...

www.saintpatricksdayparade.com/

D.

www.stpatricksdayparade.org/

http://www.stpatricks...

E.

http://cityguide.aol....

cityguide.aol.com/hartford/stpatricksday

F.

http://www.touchofire...

www.touchofirelandguesthouse.com/activities.html

G.

http://en.wikipedia.o...'s_Day

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saint_Patrick's_Day

H.

http://www.visitusa.c...

www.visitusa.com/blog/connecticut-st-patricks-day-events-march-2010-part-ii/

Enjoy your celebrations where ever you go.

Mike B
item.name: Pre St. Patrick's Day Coffee Talk Get Together on March 14
